item.title: Unity Journal 6 - Entity Component Systems
item.description: No actual Unity reading material but inspired by new features in coming out in 2018 3 Big Lies, or Why Data Oriented? Despite the many layers of abstraction, code still runs on hardware and thus, not all data layouts are equal Code modelled after the real world does not actuall add value “Real world objects” approach does not scale, every instance costs the same instead of leveraging economies of scale Code is ephemeral and has no actual value in and of itself, the data and the data transformation are valuable ECS Overview
